1: <pb/><t>Ex vetisraelal, ab'ec slolonel Jehová. Van yalan Jehová chi' d'a yib'an̈ masanil anima cajan d'a jun chon̈ab' tic, yujto man̈xalaj mach tz'elc'och tas syala'. Man̈xalaj mach vach'to spensar, man̈xalaj mach syac'och spensar d'ay.</t>
2: <t>Sq'uechaan̈ eb' sq'uexan sti' d'a tas syala', syesan eb'. Smilvaj eb', tz'elc'an eb', an̈ej ajmulal sc'ulej eb'. Slaj yixtej yetanimail eb', cotac scal smilancham anima eb'.</t>
3: <t>Yuj chi', a slum jun chon̈ab' tic, ol can tz'inan. A eb' cajan d'ay, man̈xalaj yip eb'. Ol cham noc' caltacte'al noc', noc' much yed' masanil noc' chay ay d'a yoltac a a'.</t>
4: <t>Syalan Jehová d'ayin icha tic: Malajocab' mach scot yoval d'a eb' chon̈ab' tic, yujto a mach ay voval yed'oc aton eyed' ex sacerdote.</t>
5: <t>Yuj chi', a d'a c'ualil ol ex telvoc icha d'ac'valil. Ol telvoc pax eb' in checab' eyed'oc. A in ol vac' lajvoc chon̈ab' Israel to icha e nun yaji.</t>
6: <t>Ol in satel jun in chon̈ab' tic, yujto man̈xo in naanoc yuuj. A exxo ex sacerdote, yelxo maxtzac in e na'a. Yuj chi' ol ex viq'uel d'a eyopisio. Yujto ix b'at in c'ayb'ub'al satc'olal eyuuj, yuj chi' man̈xo ol in nacot eb' eyin̈tilal.</t>
7: <t>Icha ix aj sq'uib' e b'isul ex sacerdote, icha chi' ix aj sq'uechaan̈ smul in chon̈ab'. Yuj chi' a e b'inajnaquil, q'uixvelaltac ol vutejcani.</t>
8: <t>Yuj silab' syac' in chon̈ab' yuj smul, vach' e va'i, yuj chi' tze nib'ej to tz'ochn̈ej smul in chon̈ab' tic d'ayin.</t>
9: <t>Yuj chi' lajan ol aj yab'an syail eb' in chon̈ab' eyed'oc a ex sacerdote ex tic. Yuj e b'eyb'al chi' ol vac'och yaelal d'a eyib'an̈ yed' eb'.</t>
10: <t>Yujto maxtzac in yac' servil eb' in chon̈ab', axo jun comon dios scuch Baal syac' servil eb'. Vach'chom sva eb', svay eb' yed' eb' ix ajmul ix d'a stemplo scomon diosal chi', palta man̈ yujoc chi' nivan ol satan smunlajel eb', man̈ ol q'uib'pax sb'isul eb'.</t>
11: <t>Yuj yajmulal eb' yed' yuc'uman̈il eb', yuj chi' ix quistalax spensar eb'.</t>
12: <t>A d'a junoc te te' sc'anb'ej yab' eb' in chon̈ab' tic tas sc'ulej eb'. Axo te te' chi' tz'ac'an srazón eb' yalani. Yuj yajmulal eb' chi', yuj chi' ix juviel eb'. Icha val tz'aj yactancan vin̈ yetb'eyum junoc ix ix, smulan yed' junocxo vinac, icha chi' ix in yutej eb', sb'atcan tzac'an eb' yuj comon dios.</t>
13: <t>A d'a jolomtac vitz yed' d'a tzalquixtac, ata' sn̈us incienso eb' yed' yac'an silab' eb' d'a yalan̈ yen̈ul xil te' álamo, te' ji yed' te' mach'. Yuj chi', slaj em eb' ix eyisil yed' eb' ix eyalib' d'a ajmulal.</t>
14: <t>Palta man̈ ol vac'ochlaj syaelal eb' ix eyisil yed' eb' ix eyalib' yuj yajmulal chi', yujto a ex jun tze c'ulej ajmulal chi', tzeyac'an silab' yed' eb' ix ix sb'eyb'alan ajmulal. Yuj chi', a jun chon̈ab' malaj spensar tic, ol ixtaxeloc.</t>
15: <t>Vach'chom ix och smul chon̈ab' Israel, palta mocab' och smul chon̈ab' Judá. Mocab' b'at och eb' ejmelal d'a Gilgal, mocab' q'uepax eb' d'a Bet-avén. Mocab' sloc in b'i eb' a in Jehová pitzan in tic.</t>
16: <t>A chon̈ab' Israel, te pit, lajan val icha junoc noc' vacax te ov. Tato icha chi', ¿tom ol yal in tan̈van eb' icha junoc noc' yune' calnel b'aj yax an̈c'ultac?</t>
17: <t>Axo chon̈ab' Efraín ix och tzac'an yuj juntzan̈ comon dios, palta olxo yil sb'a.</t>
18: <t>Masanil eb' syal sb'a d'a juntzan̈ comon dios, tz'ec' tzuyjab' eb' d'a scal eb' yetuc'uman̈il. Maxtzac yactej eb' sc'ulan ajmulal. A eb' yajalil eb', a tas q'uixvelaltac sgana eb' sc'ulan d'a yichan̈ to tz'alji eb' vach'il.</t>
19: <t>Icha tz'aj yic'chajb'at c'alem yuj ic', icha chi' ol aj yic'chajb'at eb'. Malaj ol yac' yal eb' yuj juntzan̈ silab' syac' d'a juntzan̈ scomon diosal chi'.</t>
